short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily synchronize your favorite videos with friends on the most popular streaming platforms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the future of synchronized streaming with our cutting-edge Chrome extension! 

Say goodbye to the frustration of trying to sync video playback with friends and family. 
Our extension seamlessly syncs playback across the most popular streaming services like Netflix, Disney+, Youtube, and more! 
Plus, it doesn't stop there - our extension works on every site that has videos! 

Get ready to blast off into a new era of shared viewing. Download our extension now and take control of your streaming destiny!

Features:
- Chat, send reactions and GIFs to your friends
- Video is always synced with your friends, no more manual adjusting and falling behind.
- Privacy focused - chat history is deleted automatically after 24 hours.
- Works on every site with videos
- Easy to use - just start the video and click the extension icon

Questions? Feel free to reach us at contact@tvgether.com!
